post:
COIN.HOST has been providing privacy-focused web hosting solutions since 2011. As of today we are proud to serve more than 20,000 businesses and individual clients from all around the globe. We offer some 70+ web hosting plans for any task and budget ranging from VPS to high performance clustered bare metal servers.

Why Bitcoin VPS COIN.HOST?

- free & instant deployment
- VMware HA hypervisor
- all-flash mirrored SSD array
- instant virtual server deployment
- SLA assured 99.9% availability
- DDoS protection for all VPS orders
- 10 Gbps network connection
- free DNS hosting
- snaphots & backups
- highest privacy and data security in accordance to Swiss laws and industry regulations

Data Center & Legal Location
COIN.HOST operates exclusively from Switzerland, our data processing facility is located in Zurich.

Data Protection
Switzerland is renowned for its strict laws and regulations on privacy and data protection, there's hardly any other country in the world with a matching grade of privacy protection at the political level. Not only your data and privacy are protected by Swiss laws, but we also take weighty efforts to secure it at the infrastructure level. Our data center in Zürich is practically a fortress: 24x7 CCTV surveillance, perimeter and inner premises security patrols, multi-layered access barriers, including mantraps and biometric readers.

Have any questions?
Our dedicated support team is ready to answer your questions and provide all the assistance you may need 24/7/365 LIVE.

Bitcoin & other cryptocurrencies accepted
COIN.HOST accepts PayPal, Credit Cards, Bank Wire, Perfect Money, WebMoney, QIWI. Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dash, Monero and ALL major Altcoins.
